DOC.detailed_description: Veterans chronic pain represent important population focus smoke cessation effort . Smoking cessation among patient chronic medical illness substantially decrease morbidity mortality ; yet , many patient ( > 50 % ) chronic pain continue smoke . This study aim test telephone delivery cognitive behavioral intervention ( CBI ) , smoke cessation among Veteran smoker chronic pain . Proposed randomized comparative effectiveness trial two-group design 370 Veteran smoker chronic pain randomize either : 1 ) smoking cessation plus CBI ( SMK-CBI ) , intervention include proactive tele-health intervention combine evidence-based smoking cessation counseling augment behavioral approach cop pain tele-medicine clinic access nicotine replacement therapy ( NRT ) , 2 ) smoking cessation telephone counsel control ( SMK Control ) , contact-equivalent control provide standard smoke cessation telephone counsel tele-medicine clinic access NRT .
